subject: From The Desk Of Dr Tedros Adh
body:
From The Desk Of Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus
Director-general and head of World Health Organization
Global Pandemic Damage Compensation
Greetings dear
Due to the recent Covid-19 currently ravaging the world, the World
Health Organization has launched a public compensation fund program to
the people mostly affected by the
Coronavirus across the globe.
The director-general of the World Health Organization, Dr Tedros
Adhanom Ghebreyesus launched this program, through the support of the
United states and the Chinese government
to pay the total of 1.5M USD (One Million Five hundred United states
dollars ) directly to an individual mostly affected by the virus.
The Chinese government, through the president Xi Jinping, apologizes
to the citizens of the world for the damages the virus caused, which
officially started from Wuhan, and
spread across the world. 
The Victims affected are enjoined to provide
proof and evidence of how the virus affected you, or your direct
family, or cause loss of your work and
business.
Kindly forward the above required information, together with your
Direct Phone number, amount you lost, address to the officer in charge
of this program. As soon as we receive
this information, we shall inform you on the next step to process your
covid-19 global compensation payment.
Best Regards
Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus
Director-general and head of World Health Organization Global Pandemic
Damage Compensation
WHOFPA W.H.O Population Fund, Global Compact
Telephone: +19178109060

subject: Re: From The Desk Of Dr Tedros Adh
body:
Hello Dr. Tedros Adhanom,

Thank you for reaching out and for the efforts of the World Health Organization in these challenging times. It's heartening to hear about this public fund program.

I'm curious, how does the process work? How do you determine who is most affected by the virus? And what kind of proof or evidence is required?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Margaret
